name: Demonrift TD : The Mountain of doom
storyline:
Defend the kingdom from the demonic surge! 
 
Emaeron has been a kingdom of peace and tranquility until one day a rift appeared at Mt. Doom, soon oceans of demonic monsters appears sporadically upon the Kingdom greatest cities. 
 
In Demonrift TD you are taking the role as Baroness Milena, commanding last stand of empire troops against the hordes of demon armies throughout the empire vast cities. 
 
Level Up and Upgrade your Hero and troops' equipments to wage war against the demons, and start defending the kingdom now!
summary:
Defend the kingdom from the demonic surge! 
 
Try this unique mix between Tower Defense and Role Playing Game, in a bite sized mobile game. 
 
In Demonrift TD you are taking the role as Baroness Milena, commanding last stand of empire troops against the mysterious surge of demon armies throughout the empire vast cities. 
 
Level Up and Upgrade your Hero and troops' equipments to wage war against the demons, and start defending the kingdom now! 
 
Features: 
- A Unique tower defense with pure RPG elements unlike any other TD 
- Level up your units, equip your units, and solve maps by applying proper strategies and well equipped troops 
- Hundreds of unique items for 5 different types of defender units 
- 20 maps with 5 stages of difficulties for every single map (except 1 final stage) 
- Different types of boss units awaits including golems, dragons, wyvern, etc 
- Tons of enemy minion units (minions can level up too)
